column3: Branch-off is in less than two weeks, so you might just clear them completely and replace them with the empty template? This way they will be prepared for 0.21 and don't need another commit.\n\nLike in this commit: 434101875c69d523ee34afee540212129be06458

I'd say this is more useful for people in the meantime (even after the branch-off, until the final release), the template might encourage people to still insert items.\n\nI'll clear out the release notes on the master branch after the branch-off.
